paper_abstract: The rank, r, and the dimension of the kernel, k, for binary Hadamard codes of length 2(t) were studied in [12], constructing such codes for all possible pairs (r, k). Now, we will focus on Hadamard codes of length 2(t) . s, s > 1 odd. As long as there exists a Hadamard code of length 4s, constructions of Hadamard codes of length n = 2(t) . s (t >= 3) with any rank, r epsilon {4s + t - 3,..., n/2), and any possible dimension of the kernel, k epsilon {1,..., t - 1}, are given.
paper_title: Hadamard codes of length 2(t)s (s Odd). Rank and kernel
